statements: SELECT * FROM water_saving_tips;
SELECT tip_id, tip_category, tip_description FROM water_saving_tips;
SELECT tip_author, tip_category, tip_id FROM water_saving_tips;
SELECT tip_description, tip_author FROM water_saving_tips;
SELECT tip_category FROM water_saving_tips;
SELECT * FROM water_saving_tips WHERE tip_category = 'Outdoor';
SELECT * FROM water_saving_tips WHERE tip_category = 'Indoor' ORDER BY tip_id DESC;
SELECT tip_id, tip_author FROM water_saving_tips WHERE tip_category = 'Gardening' AND CHAR_LENGTH(tip_description) > 100;
SELECT tip_id, tip_category, SUBSTRING(tip_description, 1, 50) AS short_description FROM water_saving_tips WHERE tip_author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tips, tip_category FROM water_saving_tips GROUP BY tip_category HAVING total_tips > 2 ORDER BY total_tips DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTipsHomeowners;
SELECT title, description FROM WaterSavingTipsHomeowners WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, description FROM WaterSavingTipsBusinesses WHERE category = 'Outdoor';
SELECT title FROM WaterSavingTipsBusinesses WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTipsHomeowners WHERE title LIKE '%garden%';
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTipsHomeowners WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM WaterSavingTipsBusinesses WHERE category = 'Outdoor';
SELECT id, title, description FROM WaterSavingTipsHomeowners WHERE title LIKE '%Tips%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTipsBusinesses WHERE id > 5 AND category = 'Indoor' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT title, category FROM WaterSavingTipsBusinesses WHERE description LIKE '%how to%' AND category = 'Outdoor';
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM WaterSavingTipsForHomeowners;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTipsForBusinesses WHERE business_category = 'Retail';
SELECT submission_id, user_name, submission_text, submission_date FROM UserSubmissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM WaterSavingTipsForHomeowners WHERE tip_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM UserSubmissions WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTipsForHomeowners WHERE tip_id = 1;
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM WaterSavingTipsForBusinesses WHERE business_category = 'Eco-Friendly';
SELECT tip_title, business_category FROM WaterSavingTipsForBusinesses ORDER BY tip_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserSubmissions WHERE submission_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tips FROM WaterSavingTipsForHomeowners;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTips;
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM WaterSavingTips WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM Likes WHERE tip_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTips;
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM WaterSavingTips WHERE posted_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT tip_title, tip_description, created_at FROM WaterSavingTips WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT Users.username, WaterSavingTips.tip_title FROM Users JOIN Likes ON Users.id = Likes.user_id JOIN WaterSavingTips ON Likes.tip_id = WaterSavingTips.id ORDER BY WaterSavingTips.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTips;
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM WaterSavingTips;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT tip_title, category_name FROM WaterSavingTips JOIN TipsCategories ON WaterSavingTips.tip_id = TipsCategories.tip_id JOIN Categories ON TipsCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT user_id, tip_title, rating FROM UserTips JOIN WaterSavingTips ON UserTips.tip_id = WaterSavingTips.tip_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSavingTips;
SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM WaterSavingTips WHERE tip_id = 1;

SELECT Users.username, WaterSavingTips.tip_title, Categories.category_name FROM Users JOIN UserTips ON Users.user_id = UserTips.user_id JOIN WaterSavingTips ON UserTips.tip_id = WaterSavingTips.tip_id JOIN TipsCategories ON WaterSavingTips.tip_id = TipsCategories.tip_id JOIN Categories ON TipsCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id WHERE Users.is_homeowner = TRUE;
SELECT Users.username, SUM(UserTips.rating) AS total_rating FROM Users JOIN UserTips ON Users.user_id = UserTips.user_id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT tip_title, COUNT(tip_id) AS total_tips FROM WaterSavingTips JOIN TipsCategories ON WaterSavingTips.tip_id = TipsCategories.tip_id GROUP BY tip_title ORDER BY total_tips DESC;
